rows.label: bf09160100_0010
rows.name: Dad!

rows.label: bf09160100_0020
rows.name: Luxuria too?!

rows.label: bf09160100_0030
rows.name:
Why?!
Saika!

rows.label: bf09160100_0040
rows.name:
It's no good[ML:Dash ]
My words aren't reaching him anymore.

rows.label: bf09160100_0050
rows.name:
Damn it all...
What is that Pope thinking?.

rows.label: bf09160100_0060
rows.name:
Is he planning to annihilate
Alst before Metsu does?

rows.label: bf09160100_0070
rows.name: It's desperation.

rows.label: bf09160100_0080
rows.name: Desperation?

rows.label: bf09160100_0090
rows.name:
Desperation at failing to obtain 
Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf09160100_0100
rows.name: That man...

rows.label: bf09160100_0110
rows.name:
What was he really planning
to do after obtaining Heaven's Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf09160100_0120
rows.name:
We need to find a way to stop the Divine Beasts
from fighting against each other.

rows.label: bf09160100_0130
rows.name:
Even if you say that, with an aerial battle like
that how do you expect us to stop it?

rows.label: bf09160100_0140
rows.name: ...That's it! Those glowing pillars!

rows.label: bf09160100_0150
rows.name:
When one of the pillars collapsed earlier
Marveni's power momentarily weakened.

rows.label: bf09160100_0160
rows.name:
So if we destroy those pillars 
the Divine Beasts will be freed?

rows.label: bf09160100_0170
rows.name:
I think so
Hikari? Can you handle it?

rows.label: bf09160100_0180
rows.name: We're only targeting the pillars, right?

rows.label: bf09160100_0190
rows.name: Yeah.

rows.label: bf09160100_0200
rows.name:
I can't get a proper aim 
with that much movement.

rows.label: bf09160100_0210
rows.name: It's absolutely impossible.

rows.label: bf09160100_0220
rows.name: That's[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf09160100_0230
rows.name: (I know - Hikari-chan!)

rows.label: bf09160100_0240
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]What?

rows.label: bf09160100_0250
rows.name:
If we can get closer
we might be able to do something.

rows.label: bf09160100_0260
rows.name: Is that true, Homura?

rows.label: bf09160100_0270
rows.name:
Yes!
Remember when we fought against Shin?

rows.label: bf09160100_0280
rows.name:
Back then, we rewrote 
the physical laws of our surroundings.

rows.label: bf09160100_0290
rows.name: We were able to keep up with Shin's speed.

rows.label: bf09160100_0300
rows.name:
In the same way, if we can rewrite
at the center of the battle between those two.

rows.label: bf09160100_0310
rows.name:
From our perspective
those two would appear to be practically stopped.

rows.label: bf09160100_0320
rows.name: But how do we get over there?

rows.label: bf09160100_0330
rows.name:
If that's the case, 
I have an excellent suggestion!

rows.label: bf09160100_0340
rows.name: Hana!

rows.label: bf09160100_0350
rows.name:
Do you think you could carry Boss and Hikari-chan
all the way up there?

rows.label: bf09160100_0360
rows.name:
Yes!
If it's only those two, I can handle it.

rows.label: bf09160100_0370
rows.name: ...There you have it!

rows.label: bf09160100_0380
rows.name:
Then please do it!
Everyone else, go after Shin!

rows.label: bf09160100_0390
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf09160100_0400
rows.name: We don't have time for discussion.

rows.label: bf09160100_0410
rows.name:
Don't worry.
We'll make it work somehow, okay?

rows.label: bf09160100_0420
rows.name: Right!

rows.label: bf09160100_0430
rows.name:
Boss! Hana's rocket boosters
have a time limit!

rows.label: bf09160100_0440
rows.name:
Got it!
We'll get as close as we can!
